column4: hi everyone, i downloaded the file firefox-3.0.9.tar.bz2  and  how can i install this application ??
What version of Firefox do you have now?
Do you need a new feature that is only in version 3.0.9?
If  you really want to install it, no problem, you can even run both versions side by side if you like, but you will not find any real advantage to it.
